All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddMedicineActivity
Activity to add a new medicine to a user's medication list.
Alarm
 
AlarmActivity
AlarmActivity is responsible for displaying the main list of alarms and provides the user with the option to add, delete, or go back to the home screen.
AlarmAddActivity
AlarmAddActivity allows users to add new alarms.
AlarmConfirmationActivity
AlarmConfirmationActivity provides the confirmation screen for deleting an alarm.
AlarmDeleteActivity
AlarmDeleteActivity allows users to delete an existing alarm.
AlarmList
AlarmList is a RecyclerView adapter that binds a list of Alarm objects to the views displayed in a RecyclerView.
AlarmList.AlarmViewHolder
ViewHolder that holds references to the views for each item in the RecyclerView.
AlarmReceiver
AlarmReceiver is a BroadcastReceiver that is triggered when an alarm goes off.
DeleteMedicationActivity
Activity for deleting medications from a user's list.
HomeActivity
 
ItemClicker
 
ItemClicker.OnItemClickListener
 
LoginActivity
 
MainActivity
 
MedicationAdapter
Adapter class for managing and displaying a list of medicines in a RecyclerView.
MedicationAdapter.OnMedicineClickListener
Interface for handling click events on medicine items.
MedicationConfirmationActivity
MedicationConfirmationActivity handles the confirmation process for deleting a selected medicine.
MedicationDetailActivity
MedicationDetailActivity displays detailed information about a specific medicine and allows users to navigate back to the previous screen while ensuring data consistency.
Medicine
Represents a medicine with a name and usage instructions.
MedicineActivity
MedicineActivity manages the list of medicines associated with a user.
ProfileActivity
 
SignupActivityOne
 
SignupActivityTwo
 
User
Represents a user with a name, age, and a list of medicines.
WeatherService
